text: This is cool: A port the UK launched the first commercial biomethanol bunkering service, which enables ships to refuel with low-carbon methanol. Progress for maritime decarbonization! (Operators see biomethanol as a fuel alternative to cut emissions)
https://t.co/1tkODGwTse
(Bunkering is basically a floating fuel pit stop: a small tanker pulls up alongside a ship at berth or anchorage near port and tops it off... ideally with biomethanol instead of diesel)

üöÄ We‚Äôre excited to officially announce Sightline‚Äôs $5.5M Seed Round! üöÄ
We‚Äôve raised $5.5m in Seed funding to scale Sightline ‚Äî our market intelligence platform powering strategic decision-making and capital allocation across the global transition economy.
The round was co-led by @TheWestlyGroup and @MoltenVentures, who join existing investors including @A8Today, @johndoerr, and @TomSteyer. In just one year since launching, Sightline has grown to over 70 international customers across leading corporates, financiers, and governments‚Äîincluding HSBC, Southern Company, BHP, Galvanize Climate Solutions, and the US Department of Energy.
This fundraise comes at a critical moment in the transition‚Äîas more than ever, companies and investors need trusted information and a clear line of sight to build competitive strategies and deploy capital. The new funding will be used to expand Sightline‚Äôs AI-powered tools, empowering customers with the actionable intelligence needed to compete and win in the transition that is rapidly transforming energy, transport, and industry.
